full_summary:
**Explosive Disposal Quick Response Truck - RFP**
================================================	prev



Discovery Notice
---------------

WS4085173421
Document 4085595409
Version 2
Publication Date: July 14, 2023

**Procurement Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), in partnership with the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites interested parties to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Explosive Disposal Quick Response Truck.

**Bid Submission Requirements**

The successful bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and a bid submission on August 31, 2023, by 14:00 HAE. Bids received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

**Notice Information**

*   Solicitation Number: WS4085173421
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: July 14, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: August 31, 2023 (14:00 HAE)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: March 31, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**RW_Availability of Qualifying Documentation**

QUSPS contract holders are invited to submit a bid. 

[Edit]

**RWuser request E Contract Instruments related to this Contract'

**Rewritten Documentation**
-copy of required documentation for tender submission\_ 

**Trade Agreements**

The following trade agreements apply:

*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Roch Desjardins at:
roch.desjardins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
or visit the Ariba Discovery notice website at:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx
